title: Seeing sweets in a dream for a man

preview.html: Through this topic from your website gptafser.com/, we mention the connotations and signs of seeing sweets in a dream for a single man, woman, and others, as the interpretation will be by senior scholars. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream for a single girl: When you see sweets for a virgin girl, this symbolizes the approaching marriage, God willing. However, if she sees herself buying sweets, this is a sign that she will live in peace and happiness in the coming period, by God’s command. Also, seeing yourself buying sweets in a dream symbolizes that this girl will go through a love story that will end in marriage, God knows best. When she eats sweets in a dream, this indicates Success in the field of work, and God knows best. Also, seeing an unmarried girl eating sweets symbolizes the success of what she desires. For a girl to see in a dream that she is buying sweets is good news for her and will help her a lot. Buying sweets in a dream indicates her acceptance of her life, which she did not accept before. Seeing sweets indicates marriage to a person with good morals, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl eats a lot of sweets, her skin becomes larger in a dream. This indicates that her life will enjoy stability and reassurance. As for watching a girl eating copious amounts of sweets, this It symbolizes changes that will affect her life for the better, God willing. When a girl sees herself eating sweets sadly in a dream. This indicates that there is an evil person who only brings her problems, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream for a woman Married When a married woman sees candy in a dream, this indicates that her and her husband’s financial situation will improve. This dream could be good news for her husband to obtain a promotion in his field of work. And God knows best. Seeing yourself buying sweets for a married woman in a dream represents a change in life for the better and may be an extension of earning her livelihood. If a married woman sees herself in a dream buying sweets, this symbolizes that she will achieve what she desires, and God knows best. Seeing sweets in a dream means that she is a woman. She has good luck and always feels satisfied. Also, the sweets in her dream symbolize her love for her husband and the happiness she experiences. This dream may be a sign of her good and praiseworthy reputation. As for her seeing sweets, it is a sign of her high social status and that she will receive abundant food, God willing. Seeing herself She is distributing sweets in a dream, which indicates stability in married life. While she was eating sweets in the dream and their taste was wonderful, this indicates that she is enjoying luxury with her life partner. This dream could be a sign of good deeds that God has taught her. Eating sweets in a dream For a married woman, it may be good news about increased profits and money, and God knows best. But when she sees in a dream that she is making sweets, this indicates that she is saving money for her family. She declares her responsibility towards her children and husband. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream about a man and its meaningIf a man sees himself in a dream

title: Interpretation of a mouse bite in a dream: Seeing a mouse bite me in a dream

preview.html: A rat bite means a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, married or single, whether black, white or gray, the big little rat bites my hand, right, left, man, head, foot, hand, finger, body, chest A mouse bite in a dream is one of the most difficult and disturbing dreams. When we see it in a dream, it causes a great state of terror and anxiety for the dreamer, which requires many important interpretations to know what the dream has in store for us. Such as a mouse bite causes a lot of pain and exhaustion to the person who dreams about it. Public life, which can seriously threaten a person’s life, can be seen in several different meanings. The famous interpreter Ibn Sirin, the international and famous dream interpreter, explained to us many meanings of seeing someone bitten by a mouse in a dream, Which has many important meanings that are interpreted according to the situation and the complete details of the dream. Which we will explain to you. First, in general: The interpretation of a mouse in a dream is that it does not express goodness or anything good. It denotes health and indicates the presence of material losses such as loss and disappointment in practical life. The person who sees a mouse in a dream feels as if he has nothing at all and that everything he possesses has been lost, which means that this vision indicates a real material loss. Seeing a mouse indicates in The dream also indicates the isolation of a spiteful woman and jealousy in a person’s life. On the other hand, seeing many mice in a dream indicates livelihood. Seeing many mice running around in the house means that there is a great blessing in the life of the dreamer, while at the same time it indicates a lack of Livelihoods within a year. If a person sees a rat coming out of a place in a dream, this vision expresses a lack of livelihood blessings. But if you see rats in dreams that occur during the day, this means a long life. Catching rats in a dream indicates the presence of a jealous and spiteful woman. A drain rat expresses Health is about a person's fear and anxiety in the world. The narrator also avoids harm from his enemies present in his environment, and thus lives in fear, and sometimes he also expresses his regret for some small problems. Seeing a mouse is interpreted according to the dreamer’s condition and in general, a mouse in a dream means an unjust person, and marrying a hypocritical person with two faces and having Harm from it. A house mouse in a dream means the fall of a woman. Seeing large numbers of mice means a long life. Playing with a mouse in a dream means thinking about this world and forgetting the afterlife. Seeing a mouse entering the house in a dream means that it is connected to a woman who appears in the form of an angel and the fact that she is a devil. Chasing a mouse means marrying a deceitful woman and the mouse coming out. From any angle, it means the presence of a child, and the presence of a mouse in the bed means adultery. Seeing a mouse indicates that there is good in the life of the person with the vision, and it also indicates that there are people who want to benefit from the wealth of the person with the vision and push their limits. It means the man with an evil heart and the one with tricks and conspiracies, and that the person who Meet the mouse in

title: Interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of intercourse This vision in a dream carries many associations and interpretations. It can be an expression of profit and exchange of benefits and it can be a sign that we will soon hear good news and it can be a source of concern and a warning to the fortune teller to stop sinning and transgressions, so we will learn about the different cases. To explain this vision through this article. Interpretation of the dream of intercourse Seeing intercourse in general has many benefits and benefits for the viewer, if it is not accompanied by a feeling of happiness and ecstasy with the other party, and the dream also expresses the achievement of goals and overcoming all difficulties and obstacles. Seeing intercourse is a sign of many good things for the dreamer, in addition to the desire to benefit from the experiences of others around him to achieve benefits and profits. In interpreting this vision, jurists say that it is a sign of a person's passion that makes him do his best to get what he wants in life, as well as a symbol of hard work to achieve desires. Al-Nabulsi says: If a man sees himself having intercourse with a woman unknown to him and beautiful in appearance, this is evidence of a very good life, but if she is ugly or bad, it is a sign. From troubles in life. Having sex with the wife in a dream is an expression of achieving all the goals that one aspires to in life, except for getting rid of problems and worries, according to Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of the dream of intercourse by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that touching the wife is a sign of love between them and an indication of the wife's pregnancy soon. Muhammad bin Sirin sees intercourse and achieving orgasm as a sign of achieving the desired and the ability to achieve gains and successes in life in general. Seeing ejaculation in a dream, jurists say, including Ibn Sirin, is an indication of self-talk and excessive thinking about intercourse, as it is one of the psychological visions. Seeing a man having sex with an enemy indicates the defeat of the enemy and his victory over the dreamer. As for intercourse with a woman of ill repute or a fornicator, it is a sign of earning a lot of money, but in wrong and forbidden ways. Interpretation of a dream of intercourse for a single woman If an unmarried woman sees that there is a man mingling with her and feeling happy with him, this is a promising vision for marriage soon, and this vision is one of the visions that indicate the need for security. Seeing someone trying to have sex with an unmarried person with hatred and feeling a strong rejection of this matter means that there are many situations in her life that she feels resentful of and cannot change, except that they were imposed on her by her parents. Always in all matters of life. And seeing an unmarried woman marrying a stranger and feeling pleasure and ecstasy with him, some jurists interpreted it as an indication of the sins and transgressions committed by the unmarried woman and she must repent for them. Interpretation of a dream of intercourse for a married woman Interpreters see in the interpretation of a dream of intercourse for a married woman that it is a sign of happiness and satisfaction in married life in general, in addition to improving all living conditions, but if she refuses intercourse and is forced to deny it. Life. Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of this vision that it is a sign that the future will remain close in addition to the

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a giraffe in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a giraffe in a dream is a type of animal distinguished by its length. It is a mammal and is the tallest animal living on the face of the Earth. Certainly, seeing a giraffe in a dream symbolizes many signs and indicators that we will show you in detail, according to prominent commentators and scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a giraffe by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a giraffe eating food in a dream means abundant nutrition. Seeing a giraffe in a dream symbolizes patience and resistance to emotion. It indicates Seeing a giraffe in a dream also indicates the right decision in many matters. Seeing a giraffe in an embrace in a dream indicates differences and problems. Interpretation of a dream about eating a giraffe: Seeing a giraffe eating in a dream indicates the control of a truly strong woman. Seeing a giraffe eating in a dream means marrying a widow. Or divorced. Also, seeing a giraffe eating in a dream indicates that it is unfair to its friend or maid. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a giraffe: Seeing a slaughtered giraffe in a dream indicates the loss of my pride and dignity. Seeing a slaughtered giraffe in a dream means forcing a girl to marry. Interpretation of a dream about a giraffe Pregnant: Seeing a giraffe in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the time of birth is approaching. Seeing a giraffe in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will give birth easily. Seeing a giraffe in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she has given birth to a child. Interpretation of a dream about a married giraffe: A married giraffe in a dream indicates the arrival A full year of prosperity and kindness. Seeing a giraffe in a dream also indicates that she has achieved her goals. Seeing a giraffe in a dream for a married woman at the zoo means that her problems are coming. Seeing a giraffe in a married dream indicates success in married life. Interpretation of a dream about a giraffe for a single woman: Vision A giraffe in one's dream is a sign of one's speed towards achieving one's goals. Seeing a giraffe is also considered a dream for a single woman, as it is a sign of her coming to a wedding or traveling to her. Seeing a giraffe for a girl in a dream indicates that she has qualities such as beauty and grace. Seeing a giraffe indicates in The dream also indicates a high and exalted position.

title: Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dream about menstrual blood in a dream about menstrual blood is the blood that comes out of an adult woman periodically, and it usually happens about every month, and this dream often expresses a woman’s anxiety about the menstrual cycle if it occupies a large space of her mind. You may also be interested in By knowing more about worms in the dream. And in case it does not take up space in her thoughts, this dream has many explanations and interpretations, so let us take you on a quick tour to get to know the most important interpretations of the dream of menstruation. Interpretation of seeing a dream about menstrual blood in a dream of the Asami. Interpretation of the dream of menstrual blood. In a dream for Al-Osaimi, this dream usually expresses relief from the problems you face in your life and that all your circumstances will change for the better. It also expresses hearing a lot of good news. Basically, this dream indicates the abundance of goods and a lot of money that you will earn in the future and expresses improvement. Material conditions to a large extent, and seeing it in abundance in a dream is an indication that you will be able to achieve all your dreams. Seeing it in dark color is one of the unpleasant dreams that express the problems that will afflict you in the coming days and from which you will suffer a lot behind these problems. Menstrual blood In a married woman’s dream, this dream indicates a happy married life and that her relationship with her husband will improve greatly and she will live a stable and happy life with him. This dream also indicates that her pregnancy is approaching and that her newborn will be healthy. If the color of her menstrual period is black, then it is one of the bad dreams that express the many differences between her and her husband, and these problems may lead to separation. However, if she sees that she is wearing clothes stained with menstrual blood . It is a warning to her that her behavior is very bad and she must work to modify those behaviors. And if she sees that menstrual blood washes her, then this is one of her good dreams that portends her liberation from the worries and sorrow that she is currently suffering from, in addition to the great improvement in her circumstances. Read also: Interpretation of a vision A faucet in a dream: A pregnant woman seeing live blood is one of the distinctive dreams that bring a lot of good news to her, that her birth will be very easy and that her new baby will be healthy, because it indicates the goodness of the offspring and that her son will be him. free businees. For her. And seeing menstrual blood in black is not a praiseworthy thing at all, because it expresses the problems that she will face during pregnancy or during the birth process. Menstrual blood in a dream about the fiancée. If she sees in her dream that she is drinking from a cup containing menstrual blood, this is a warning to her that There is an immoral person who cast magic on her, and this magic can be eaten or drunk. He must deal with her immediately with legal ruqyah. But if she sees that she and her fiancé are eating food that contains menstrual blood, this is evidence that someone has done magic to divorce her, and the engagement may be broken off and ended because of this magic. As for the unmarried woman who sees menstrual blood in her dream It is one of the praiseworthy dreams that expresses the imminence of hearing a lot of happy news in the future

Freedom from trouble, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a divorced woman reading the Qur’an expresses a good condition, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees a divorced woman reading the Qur’an, it may express the solution of problems with her husband, and God knows best. Also, seeing a divorced woman reading the Qur’an may mean getting rid of worry and sadness. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman calling in a dream could indicate getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. When a divorced woman sees herself praying in In a dream, this may be a sign of weakness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, while absolute supplication may indicate that the situation has changed for the better, and God is All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams of a divorced woman hitting her husband in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a divorced woman hitting her husband in a dream may be an indication of the benefits she obtains from him, and God Know that if a divorced woman sees her ex-husband beating her in a dream, this may be evidence of the benefits she derives from him, and God knows the unseen. When she sees an absolute blow, it could be a sign of benefits and interests, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman committing adultery in a dream. The interpretation of the dream could be about a woman. A divorced woman committing adultery in a dream is a sign of a woman being warned by an evil man, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a divorced woman committing adultery may indicate the pressure she is suffering from, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees adultery, it may lead to a loss of money, and God knows the unseen. Also, absolute adultery can It portends a warning against committing sins and disobedience, and God is Most High. Interpretation of a dream about my divorced friend’s engagement in a dream. If the dreamer sees his divorced friend’s engagement, this may lead to positive changes And God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees the engagement of her divorced friend, it may be a sign of good news, and God knows the unseen. It can also indicate goodness and happiness, and God has all knowledge. title: Learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of swimming in the sea at night

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about swimming in the sea at night: There is no doubt that swimming is a very enjoyable thing that everyone longs for, and many are interested in learning to swim, whether they are old or young, but can swimming at night be beneficial to the dreamer? We will learn these through the interpretations of our esteemed scholars. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in the sea at night by Ibn Sirinama Interpretation of a dream about swimming in the sea at night? The vision expresses the extent of the dreamer’s victory over his enemies and not allowing them to interfere in his life, but there are limits to dealing with them to limit their damage. Interpreters believe that The dreamer is one who cares about his religion and wants to please his Lord and do what is good and beneficial to him in the afterlife. If the dreamer is very skilled at swimming, this indicates his tremendous success in science and achieving distinction that will place him in the highest positions in his society. If the sea is not calm, then this is Rivalry between the dreamer and one of his relatives, so he must end this quarrel immediately so that he can be at his best. As for the swelling of the sea for a single woman, this is promising evidence of his happiness and marriage to a righteous virgin who fears God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in the sea at night by Ibn Sirin: Swimming is a pleasure in some way itself, but it can indicate some fear and anxiety if it is night, but we find that the meaning is very promising and indicates many victories in life. The vision indicates the ability to overcome all difficult circumstances, whether material or psychological, and this makes life stable and calm. If it is The dreamer is skilled at swimming, then this is evidence that he will complete all his work without mistakes. However, if he is not skilled at swimming, this leads to difficulties in his life that affect his life, and here he must be more careful to overcome this crisis without any harm. If the dreamer is swimming in Volatile seas, this indicates that he is exposed to anxiety in his life as a result of losing his job or financial loss. Learn more than 2000 interpretations by Ibn Sirin Ali on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website from Google. Interpretation of dreams about swimming in the sea at night for single women. An unmarried girl is preoccupied with many thoughts, as she has a wide imagination It makes her want to achieve what she is thinking about. If she swims in clear water, this is evidence of her victory throughout her life. But if she swims in turbid water, this indicates that she will face problems in her life, and she should not be pessimistic because she has a long life ahead of her until she achieves everything she wants. If the sea is rushing, this indicates that she is connected to an inappropriate person and here she needs to reconsider her relationship with him to make her life better with him. The dreamer who drowns in the sea indicates that she will enter into different relationships that could become an obstacle in her life and here she must be careful. She avoids any harm that may befall her in her life. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in the sea at night for a married woman: Seeing her drowning in a dream means that the dreamer will face various marital problems, but she is always trying to get rid of them to end her fatigue and sadness, so she needs to find someone who will stand by her so that she can get out. Of which. on him. Problems without suffering any psychological damage. If you swim

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his wife, according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his wife: As a result of the wife’s intense love for her husband, she sees many visions related to her husband’s marriage to another woman, which causes her to live in a state of anxiety and tension as she often does, but many major commentators have explained that this vision carries some differences. Meanings and interpretations according to the details of each vision. Interpretation of the dream of a husband marrying his wife by Ibn Sirinama. Interpretation of the dream of a husband marrying his wife? Interpretation of the dream of a husband marrying his wife is evidence that the dreamer, male or female, will be blessed with goodness, because seeing marriage is one of the good dreams that convey news. The pleasant one. Its owner. The devil often possesses this dream due to disagreements between spouses, and if the dreamer sees in her dream her husband marrying her, this means that the husband will obtain a prominent position in his work or will find a better job. If the dreamer sees that he will marry his wife, this means that he will get A large sum of money, and when he sees that he is marrying a very beautiful and elegant woman, this is a sign that he will become very wealthy in the future. If the husband works in trade, the vision reflects the successful deals that will be achieved through his business work, but if he is sick and sees himself He marries a woman other than his wife, so this is a sign of his death. Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his wife by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that if a wife sees in her dream that her husband has married another person, this is evidence of an abundant life, happiness, and stability in life, and the vision is considered a sign of Some positive changes for her and the whole family. Members. When she sees that her husband married a girl who has never been married before, the dream is a sign of sustenance and blessing in her life. Ibn Sirin indicated that when a man sees that he has married someone other than his wife, this is evidence that he will see days full of love and happiness. He interprets the husband’s marriage to his wife. That he will achieve great success in his work, which will make him reach an important position. If the husband sees that he has married his wife again, this indicates that he will have good offspring and mutual love and affection with his wife. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds. Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Interpretation of a dream about a husband getting married From his married wife: When a married woman dreams that her husband is marrying another woman, this indicates her fear of her home and her desire to avoid the mistakes she made in the past. This vision also shows the stability of her life with her husband, and kindness and livelihood will come to this house. The vision is considered a sign of the married woman’s pregnancy, if she is not pregnant from Before, and if she sees that her husband is marrying another woman unknown to her, this indicates the death of the husband. Interpretation of a dream about a husband who marries his wife to a pregnant woman. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her husband has married her, this vision often brings goodness to her and her husband and indicates her sustenance with material gains and goodness. In her life. If a pregnant woman sees that her husband married her to a woman she does not know, this means that her husband loves her and cannot stay away from her, and this vision indicates that he will make an effort to get closer to her more

title: Interpretation of seeing a mosque in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about entering the mosque for a single woman? Evidence of her desire to get closer to God. What is the purpose of seeing congregational prayer in the mosque? It symbolizes benefits. I see you entering the mosque, praying the prayer, and then leaving? The dreamer has good qualities. What does it mean to see prayer in the mosque in a dream? To get rid of all problems and crises. Interpretation: If a pregnant woman enters the mosque? She announces that all her desires have been fulfilled. The importance of carpets and clean glass? It symbolizes a feeling of calm and psychological comfort. The meaning of seeing you running away and hiding in the mosque? It symbolizes the presence of enemies around him in reality. Interpretation Seeing a mosque in a dream: If a single woman sees herself entering the mosque in a dream, this indicates her desire to get closer to God. But if a married woman sees herself praying with her husband in the mosque, this is good. Whereas seeing a divorced woman praying with women in the mosque symbolizes joys and happy occasions. If a man sees that he is eating in the mosque in a dream, this indicates that he will obtain lawful money. And whoever sees in his dream that he goes to the mosque symbolizes abandoning sins and transgressions. Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth to her child in the mosque means that she will give birth to a righteous son. Interpretation of a dream about a mosque by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a mosque In a dream, as Ibn Sirin explains, when one enters the mosque in a dream with a group of people while making a hole, this is evidence of marriage soon. And whoever sees in a dream the state of being a mosque, this is evidence of the honor and religiosity of the one who saw it. Seeing the person inside the dream is that He enters the mosque and begins to worship, as this is evidence of repentance and return to God Almighty. Seeing death in the mosque is evidence of the dreamer’s adherence to his religion and a sign of a good ending. A large number of people entering the mosque is evidence of the dreamer’s marriage. Interpretation of seeing prayer in the mosque in a dreamIf he sees The dreamer is praying in the mosque in a dream, this indicates the arrival of kindness and contentment. This vision in a man’s dream can also indicate that he will achieve a lot of profits. But if the sleeper sees performing the obligatory prayer inside the mosque, it indicates sincere repentance. Ibn Sirin believes that the vision Praying in congregation in the mosque symbolizes benefit. While seeing an unmarried girl symbolizes that she is praying in the mosque, her wedding date is approaching. If a pregnant woman sees that she is praying inside the mosque, this indicates that the pregnancy has stopped. Leaving the mosque in a dream. If the dreamer sees that he is leaving the mosque after praying, This symbolizes kindness and abundance of livelihood. But if he is seen leaving the mosque without praying, this indicates the corruption of his morals and religion. If he is seen leaving the mosque before praying, this indicates his preoccupation with the world. Seeing you entering the mosque and then leaving without praying indicates his flaws in performing worship. Entering the mosque for purposes other than prayer and then leaving it is opportunistic. To see yourself entering the mosque, praying, and then leaving this indicates a good dreamer. Hiding in the mosque in a dream. Whoever dreams that he is hiding in the mosque indicates abandoning what is forbidden from doing so, this vision can also indicate positive changes that will occur in the mosque. The life of the seer. Seeing the escape and what is hidden in the

title: Interpretation of a dream about honey in a dream for a single, married and pregnant girl

preview.html: Seeing honey in a dream for a pregnant woman, for a married woman, for an unmarried woman, the meaning of black honey or seeing white, eating honey, extracting wax from the hive, by Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, - Al-Nabulsi and many others. Honey in a dream is one of the most beautiful dreams in our lives, as honey has many uses. Because of its great and wonderful benefits for the health of the body, but seeing honey in a dream definitely has a different meaning. Through our topic, we will learn about the interpretation of honey and its symbols in dreams. Interpretation of honey in a dreamHoney in a dream is money that comes spontaneously to the one who eats it, and good luck in work if he sees or buys it, and for the religious the sweetness of worship, and for the people of the world money without effort. For women, marriage, good company, a good heart, a sound mind, logic and language. Interpretation of honey in a dream according to Imam al-Sadiq. Honey symbolizes money, as Imam al-Sadiq explained. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating honey, its connotations are that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money, God willing. Likewise, honey in a person’s dream An experienced and religious person symbolizes his righteousness and faith. Buying honey also symbolizes success at work and in the career field. Imam Al-Sadiq saw that honey is good, happiness, luck, and money. Interpretation of honey in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Honey in a dream symbolizes money. Honey falling from the sky also symbolizes the dreamer’s faith and piety. Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing honey can indicate envy. Eating honey and bread symbolizes a happy life and good luck for the Lord. Interpretation of honey in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen explained that honey in a dream symbolizes the integrity of the religious actions carried out by the monarch, if the monarch is a worshiper. And obedient to God Almighty. It also symbolizes recovery from illness. Honey in a dream, according to Ibn Shaheen, also symbolizes marriage or work. Interpretation of drinking honey in a dream: Eating honey in a dream and feeding others with it symbolizes the dreamer’s justice and wisdom. Honey symbolizes the fulfillment of desires in a dream. Eating honey with the tongue immediately symbolizes happiness and happy days in the dreamer’s life, which he will soon enjoy. Eating beeswax for a sick person symbolizes his recovery. Beeswax also symbolizes good speech. Beeswax symbolizes happiness between spouses and compassion between them. Honey in a dream for a married woman. All A married woman sees in her dream that she is drinking or eating honey. This is evidence of the stability of the foundations of her home, the wisdom of her husband, and the goodness of her children. Eating honey in a married woman’s dream symbolizes her happiness with her family and the goodness of her children. It also symbolizes the stability of the family in the life of a married woman. Pouring honey symbolizes A dream indicates a lot of money and abundance of livelihood. Honey in a dream for a pregnant woman. As for a pregnant woman who sees honey in her dream, she will rejoice in her baby. Honey symbolizes the fulfillment of the pregnant woman’s desire in reality regarding the sex of her baby, so God will give her what she wanted to be the type of baby, God willing. And whoever sees In a dream, she receives a gift of honey, which indicates that her baby will be a boy, God willing. Honey in a dream for a single woman is good news for any unmarried girl, because
